    fake = Faker()
    fake_profile = fake.profile()

def generate_fake_data(num_records: int):
    fake_users = []
    for _ in range(num_records):
        user = create_fake_user()
        fake_users.append(user)
    return fake_users

if __name__ == "__main__":
